attributes.action: Prevent further population growth in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is overpopulated, all our services are suffering from over-crowding,
hospitals, schools, prisons, roads, trains, etc. Our quality 
of life is suffering.

Steps should be taken to limit immigration and birth rates.
With this small step we wouldn't need road pricing, more power
stations, more roads, more houses etc.
